thread.title: Stardock's 'Ashes of the Singularity' launches today - the first game to support DirectX 12

title: Stardock's 'Ashes of the Singularity' launches today - the first game to support DirectX 12
text:
Stardock's 'Ashes of the Singularity' launches today - the first game to support DirectX 12 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
The first title to support DirectX 12 has released today on Steam Early Access. 'Ashes of the Singularity' is a new title from Stardock, whi...
